tool_description: The DZI API is a convenient tool designed to stitch Deep Zoom Images (DZI) into high-resolution, full-sized images. With customizable output formats and resizing options, this API simplifies the complex task of handling DZI images, making it an efficient solution for maps, artwork, medical imagery applications, and more.
name: DZI Stitcher
title: DZI Stitcher

api_list.name: dzi_to_image
